main event: Two bright cigar-shaped objects were reported in the sky over Placerville, California on August 6, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be 1500 miles from the observer and at an altitude of 2000 feet., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The objects were traveling parallel to the ground at high speed., The objects made a sudden right-angle turn and disappeared from sight., Weather conditions reported clear visibility of 20 miles with winds at 10,000 feet at 22 knots.
sighted object: two bright cigar-shaped objects in the sky
